类 Handler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Handler
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Handler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The thread responsible for communicating with a single customer.
    版本:
    1.0.
    作者:
    Liu Yuyang.

      • initStream

        public void initStream()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Initializes the input/output stream object method.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - IOException.

      • run

        public void run()
        Override run method to do with different cmd.
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable
        另请参阅:
        Runnable.run()

      • sendFile

        private void sendFile(java.lang.String fileName)
               throws java.net.SocketException,
                      java.io.IOException,
                      java.lang.InterruptedException
        Sends a file by fileName.
        参数:
        fileName - the fileName of the file that wants sending.
        抛出:
        java.net.SocketException - SocketException.
        java.io.IOException - IOException.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - InterruptedException.

      • backDir

        private void backDir()
        Implement cd.. function, Back to upper direction.

      • listDir

        private void listDir(java.lang.String currentPath)
        Lists files and directions in the current path.
        参数:
        currentPath - the path wants listing.

      • addSpace

        public static java.lang.String addSpace(int count)
        Aligns prints by adding space.
        参数:
        count - the count of space needs printing.
        返回:
        the space.

      • moveDir

        private void moveDir(java.lang.String dir)
        Changes direction into dir.
        参数:
        dir - the direction wants changing into.

      • isFileExist

        public static boolean isFileExist(java.lang.String fileName)
        Judges if file exists in current path.
        参数:
        fileName - the name of file needs judging.
        返回:
        if file exits in current path.
